command.steel_and_honor.kingdom.invalid_: Unknown dye color. Try names like red, blue, or white.
command.steel_and_honor.kingdom.flag.no_: Only the kingdom ruler can change the flag.
Hold a banner in your main hand to set it as the flag.
command.steel_and_honor.kingdom.no_permi: You do not have permission to perform that action.
command.steel_and_honor.kingdom.create.s: Founded a new realm with colors of %s.
command.steel_and_honor.kingdom.create.m: You must leave your current kingdom before founding a new one.
command.steel_and_honor.kingdom.create.n: A kingdom already uses that name.
command.steel_and_honor.kingdom.not_memb: You are not part of any kingdom.
command.steel_and_honor.kingdom.member.u: That player is not part of your kingdom.
command.steel_and_honor.kingdom.role.unk: Unknown role. Try leader, officer, politician, military, or citizen.
command.steel_and_honor.kingdom.role.tra: Only the current ruler may remain leader.
command.steel_and_honor.kingdom.color.sa: That color is already in use.
command.steel_and_honor.kingdom.rename.t: Kingdom names must be at least 3 characters long.
Kingdom names must be at most 32 characters long.
command.steel_and_honor.kingdom.rename.i: Kingdom names may only contain letters, numbers, spaces, commas, periods, apostrophes, and hyphens.
command.steel_and_honor.kingdom.rename.n: That is already your current kingdom name.
command.steel_and_honor.kingdom.invite.a: That player already belongs to a kingdom.
command.steel_and_honor.kingdom.invite.e: That player already has an invitation from your kingdom.
command.steel_and_honor.kingdom.invite.n: %s has invited you. Use /kingdom join %s to accept.
command.steel_and_honor.kingdom.join.alr: You must leave your current kingdom first.
command.steel_and_honor.kingdom.join.unk: No kingdom found with that name.
command.steel_and_honor.kingdom.join.no_: You do not have an invitation to that kingdom.
command.steel_and_honor.kingdom.join.suc: You are now a citizen of %s.
command.steel_and_honor.kingdom.leave.su: You are no longer part of a kingdom.
command.steel_and_honor.kingdom.leave.le: Transfer leadership or remove every member before leaving.
command.steel_and_honor.kingdom.claim.li: %3$s can currently manage %1$s territories. Only the first %1$s of %2$s claims are active.
command.steel_and_honor.kingdom.claim.ov: %s cannot expand into %s because another kingdom already borders this region.
command.steel_and_honor.kingdom.war.only: Only established kingdoms can declare war.
command.steel_and_honor.kingdom.war.unkn: No kingdom found with that name.
command.steel_and_honor.kingdom.war.self: You cannot declare war on yourself.
command.steel_and_honor.kingdom.war.exis: You are already at war with that kingdom.
command.steel_and_honor.kingdom.war.in_p: Your kingdom is already waging a war.
command.steel_and_honor.kingdom.war.targ: That kingdom is already embroiled in a war.
command.steel_and_honor.kingdom.war.requ: You cannot join another war right now.
You cannot request to join your own war.
That kingdom is not currently at war.
You already have a pending assistance request for that war.
%s wishes to join your war. Use /kingdom war approve <name> to respond.
Sent a request to join %s's war.
No assistance request from that kingdom.
%s declined your request to join their war.
Denied %s's request to join your war.
command.steel_and_honor.kingdom.war.vict: %s wins the war against %s! Final score: %s - %s.
command.steel_and_honor.kingdom.war.draw: The war between %s and %s ended in a draw at %s - %s.
screen.steel_and_honor.menu.title: Steel & Honor Council
screen.steel_and_honor.menu.home.title: Strategic Overview
screen.steel_and_honor.menu.home.info: Use this tablet to orchestrate every royal decree.
screen.steel_and_honor.menu.home.tip: Each tab focuses on a different aspect of your realm.
screen.steel_and_honor.menu.status.title: Realm Status
screen.steel_and_honor.menu.status.info: Request a live summary of your role and allegiance.
screen.steel_and_honor.menu.management.i: Found a new kingdom, rename the crown, or refresh your colors.
screen.steel_and_honor.menu.citizens.inf: Invite allies, accept offers, or resign from your realm.
screen.steel_and_honor.menu.war.title: War & Diplomacy
screen.steel_and_honor.menu.war.info: Declare wars or coordinate assistance requests.
screen.steel_and_honor.menu.flag.title: Kingdom Flag
screen.steel_and_honor.menu.flag.info: Manage and preview your kingdom's banner.
screen.steel_and_honor.menu.help.title: Guidance
screen.steel_and_honor.menu.help.info: Browse command documentation or open the in-game manual.
text.steel_and_honor.keybind.tip: Press I to open the Steel & Honor Council menu (changeable in Controls → Steel & Honor).
command.steel_and_honor.kingdom.forcejoi: Transfer the realm's leadership before forcibly reassigning its ruler.
command.steel_and_honor.kingdom.help.cre: Start a new realm with your preferred colors.
command.steel_and_honor.kingdom.help.ren: Rename your kingdom to fit your story.
command.steel_and_honor.kingdom.help.col: Change the color used for borders and overlays.
command.steel_and_honor.kingdom.help.fla: Copy the held banner into your official crest.
command.steel_and_honor.kingdom.help.rol: Assign roles to members of your kingdom.
command.steel_and_honor.kingdom.help.inv: Invite new citizens (leader or politician only).
command.steel_and_honor.kingdom.help.joi: Accept an invitation to a realm.
command.steel_and_honor.kingdom.help.war: Declare war on another established realm.
command.steel_and_honor.kingdom.help.inf: Review your realm status and current role.
command.steel_and_honor.kingdom.war.surr: You may not surrender until the war has been active for 25 minutes.
command.steel_and_honor.kingdom.war.none: Your kingdom is not currently at war.
text.steel_and_honor.hud.war.title: War: %s vs %s
